title: FS: Raw N172 Old Judges (sold cards removed, new cards added)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: FS: Raw N172 Old Judges (sold cards removed, new cards added)
posts.post_content:
FS: Raw N172 Old Judges. Prices are shipped. PPFF preferred, but I’m flexible. PM with any questions. Willing to listen to offers, especially on multiple cards. 

Baldwin $175
Dealey $275 (a couple of light creases on front, otherwise looks great)
King $175 (pinholes in corners, great image)
Geiss $250 (nice image!)
Daley $200 SOLD
Clarkson HOF $750 (ad trimmed off bottom)

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53227745675_f173410264_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53227245501_5cbde39022_b.jpg[/IMG]
Let’s see if there’s more interest in these at lower prices.
Sold cards removed, new cards added, prices reduced.
